Rebuilding the GDB GUI

If you are rebuilding the Cygnus Developer's Kit (or GDB by itself), use the `--enable-gdbtk' option to configure to configure GDB to use the new GUI.

Note: Rebuilding GDB under Solaris or HPUX is known to fail with the `--enable-gdbtk' option set. Contact us at +1-800-CYGNUS-1 for a patch if this is a problem for you.

For more information on rebuilding from source, see the manual Rebuilding From Source. Also, be sure to check section Notes on rebuilding from source, for some known problems in rebuilding this release.
